title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Des Moines
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge Des Moines
posts.post_content: After a bit of a dry spell, excited to be adding 2 cards to my Des Moines Old Judge set. I’m currently up to 53/84 known poses. Always looking for more if anyone has one available. Probably a long shot, but I have an Alvord, Sage, Schildknecht, and Stearns (non Des Moines versions) that I’d trade for Des Moines cards I still need.
Tyler is a great guy to deal with--help him out if you can
Thanks Jay! You’ve been a huge help in getting me this far with my collection.
Bumping this post up. I’m always looking for Des Moines Old Judge cards if anyone has some available.. I think I’ve gotten all the cards I can from Jay at the moment.

posts.post_title: Re: WTB: N172 Old Judge Des Moines
posts.post_content: I have a skinned Hart here: [url]https://t206.monkberry.com/19thcentury.html[/url]
Thanks I have both Hart poses. Sent you a message on another OJ though.
